solution_line_template: Basil gets {morning_cookie} in the morning and {bedtime_cookie} at bedtime so she gets {morning_cookie}+{bedtime_cookie} = <<{morning_cookie}+{bedtime_cookie}={total_half_cookies}>>{total_half_cookies} whole cookie

Basil also gets {daytime_cookies} whole cookies during the day so all total she gets {daytime_cookies}+{total_half_cookies} =<<{daytime_cookies}+{total_half_cookies}={total_daily_cookies}>>{total_daily_cookies} whole cookies

She needs cookies for {days} days and eats {total_daily_cookies} a day so she needs {days}*{total_daily_cookies} = <<{days}*{total_daily_cookies}={total_cookies_needed}>>{total_cookies_needed} cookies

Her cookies come {cookies_per_box} per box and she needs {total_cookies_needed} cookies so she needs {total_cookies_needed}/{cookies_per_box} = <<{total_cookies_needed}/{cookies_per_box}={boxes_needed}>>{boxes_needed} boxes of cookies
